scripts.build: bun run build:debug && bun run build:release && bun run build:contracts
scripts.build:contracts: bunx hardhat typechain && bunx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy:debug: bun run build:debug && bunx seda-sdk wasm upload ./build/debug.wasm
scripts.deploy:release: bun run build:release && bunx seda-sdk wasm upload ./build/release.wasm
scripts.deploy:contracts: bun run build:contracts && bunx hardhat deploy:PriceFeed --network sepoliaBase --verify
